name: longneck
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a type of beer bottle with a long, fairly thin neck: They stick slices of lime into the longneck bottles. The spicy hot potatoes are the perfect complement for an ice-cold long-neck.
More examplesFewer examplesWhy not crack open a longneck and call it a day.He had a longneck in one hand and a cigarette in the other.On a Sunday you get the burger and longneck of your choice for $10.The crown cap is most widely used on returnable soft drink and longneck beer bottles.
